resources.string: Press the DP button to toggle between movable and pinned state. Long press to remove.

Enable to allow interaction with Image Overlays on the map when the outline is visible. If no outline is visible, then the Image Overlay cannot be interacted with. If this is false, no interaction can occur even if the outline is visible.
Adjust preferences for the Digital Pointer toolbar
Which type of Datalink message to send for self-SA messages
This is the start of the block of Datalink IDs that should be auto-assigned to hostiles
Tap to manage Persisted Datalink IDs
If checked other users\' Datalink IDs will appear on the map
In the Self Coordinate Display, replace the callsign with the Datalink ID

The Digital Pointer (DP) has a menu item that when selected allows the DP to be dragged around the radius to correct issues introduced by the magnetic compass in the Laser Range Finder. The red cone displays a 10 degree offset of either side of the reported shot to aid in correction.
The maximum delay between sending updates for the DP point, if enabled (in seconds) even if the DP is not modified. Moving a DP point locally will generate updates immediately.
Enable Auto Zoom feature to display self and DP in map view when tool is first launched

In this version, the Image Overlay tab has been fully migrated to the Overlay Manager.
Image Overlay files, in TIF or KMZ file format, should be placed in the atak/grg folder on either the sdcard or the internal memory.

Imagery based map products (pfps, native, layers) should now be placed in the atak/imagery folder either on the sdcard or the internal memory.

Overlay products like KML, KMZ, LPT, DRW, etc should be placed in the atak/overlay folder either on the sdcard or internal memory.
Invalid DP update delay set. Resetting to default value 5.
Number of DPs to show in the Digital Pointer toolbar
Sets the width of the FAH cone (in degrees) when enabled from a DP or the Red X (rounds to the closest increment of 10)
